entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Semantic Search: Consider adding support for in-proc query execution #72617
  • Call Hierarchy does not set focus to editor #72615
  • No TypeDefinitionDocuments entries compiled for enums/interfaces etc in pdb #72607

Closed

  • Compiler doesn't terminate on file with syntax errors #72557
    17.10
  • CompletionService.GetCompletionsAsync NullReferenceException #72389
  • Analyzer summary should show suppressor ID #69628
    18.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Log build host stack trace in exception handling #72624
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update EOL versions #72623
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add CreateTokenParser public API #72622
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Break added documents into batches when processing solution/compilation translation states. #72621
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't classify regex/json in binary string addition #72620
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Replay Binary Log Tool #72619
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2409580 #72618
    auto-merge
  • Recover from wrong collection expression target type in nullable walker #72616
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • [VB] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants, or whose embedded expressions are only string as optimized as `&` operator or C# (pre 10.0) #72611
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Expose a way for Razor to register capabilities into the AlwaysActivateInProcLanguageClient #72609
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Pass the temp path to DesktopStrongNameProvider ctor #72587
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Disable diagnostics when solution crawler option is disabled #72590
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Share compilation when generators don't produce any generated files #72602
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix event hookup even when in a projection buffer #72608
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix excessive compilation times due to speculative parsing after an incomplete string #72565
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Drop win32-ia32 language server support #72605
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove workaround for .net7 r2r assembly loading issue #72603
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72430
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Fix #69628 Analyzer summary should show suppressor ID #72569
    Area-Analyzers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • [17.10] Bump roslyn-sdk and System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #72458
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disallow modifiers in local_using_declaration #72589
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Prefer pattern-based over interface-based disposal in await using #72598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix LspFileChangeWatcher case sensitivity #72555
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SolutionCompilationState.CreateCompilationTrackerMap #72596
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Qualify the type when negating a pattern to a not pattern #72466
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Handle InterceptsLocation with location specifier string #72553
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Don't report CLS compliance warnings for attributes on inacessible types #68527
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
